name: Sangoku Hime 2: Kouhata Houkou - Kakuseimeshi Taiga
name_original: Sangoku Hime 2: Kouhata Houkou - Kakuseimeshi Taiga
description:
Sangoku Hime 2: Kouhata Houkou - Kakuseimeshi Taiga is a strategy game developed by SystemSoft Alpha. It came out on 01-08-2013. It was published by SystemSoft Alpha.
You can play Sangoku Hime 2: Kouhata Houkou - Kakuseimeshi Taiga on PlayStation 3.
